ygData.subject: Re: Level 12 spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Lesser Shielding is a Level 8 spell which you probably already have.  I would suggest  Halo of light if you don t have infravision/ultravision and Resistant
ygData.messageBody:
Lesser Shielding is a Level 8 spell which you probably already have. I would
suggest Halo of light if you don't have infravision/ultravision and Resistant
Skin if you tend to fight those diseased creatures. Cancel Magic may be useful
although I've personally never used it. Otherwise keep saving for those nifty
level 16 spells. There are 6 spells at that level that I'm looking foward to.
(Shielding, Invis, Flame Shock, Shieldskin, Lightning Bolt, and Identify)

>
